headline: Consumers Upgrading Mobile Devices Faster as Signs of AI Adoption Emerge
summary: ATLANTA, March 04, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes, and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today released its Assurant 2024 Mobile Trade-in and Upgrade Industry Trends Report, which tracks the evolution of the secondary device market. The report suggests that AI is potentially emerging as a higher priority in consumers’ decisions to upgrade devices in 2025, as newer devices became

headline: Assurant: Consistent Growth Through Strategic Partnerships And Focus
summary: Assurant is a strong dividend growth investment. Currently undervalued with a fair value estimate of $226.80. See why we believe AIZ stock is a buy.
